review.title: “Great people, good products, and room for you to make a difference”
review.pros: Pros – A small company with a big heart. Management treats you like family! Products are good and there is a lot of room for expanding customer base. If you make a genuine contribution, management will recognize your efforts and you will be rewarded
review.cons: Cons – None if you live near stillwater. I loved working there and would recommend it to anyone with or without an interest in the audio industry
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep up the good work! Almost there...
